description: This is a shell script file containing utility functions for handling bundle version sorting, metadata retrieval, package management, and bundle validation in a device software environment.

methods.name: sortVersions
methods.description: Sorts version strings numerically using temporary directory and ls -v.

methods.name: getOldestVersion
methods.description: Returns the oldest version from a list of version strings.

methods.name: getLatestVersion
methods.description: Returns the latest version from a list of version strings.

methods.name: getInstalledVersions
methods.description: Retrieves installed versions from metadata files.

methods.name: getInstalledPackages
methods.description: Lists installed packages by traversing the RDM app directory.

methods.name: sanityCheckBundle
methods.description: Performs sanity check to verify required files are present in a bundle directory.

methods.name: extractBundle
methods.description: Extracts a tar bundle to a specified directory, with validation.
